text:
i recommend the <https://github.com/1rosehip/jplist-es6|jplist> plugin. Allows filters, search, pagination.

The newer ES6 version unfortunately doesn't work on IE, but the <https://github.com/1rosehip/jplist|older jquery version> does.

Another down side is that the supporting website is no longer online, although you can still follow the examples within the github repo for guidance
